words.meaning: /kæriktə'ristik/ n. very typical of something or of somebody's character
words.vietnamese: đặc trưng, đặc điểm, đặc thù

words.meaning: /kɔnsikwəns/ n. a result of something that has happened
words.vietnamese: kết quả, hậu quả, hệ quả; tầm quan trọng, tính trọng đại

words.meaning: /kən'sidə/ v. to think about something carefully
words.vietnamese: cân nhắc, suy xét, suy nghĩ

words.meaning: /kʌvə/ v. to include something; to deal with something
/ˈekspaiə'reiʃn/ n. an ending of the period of time when an official document can be used
words.vietnamese: Sự mãn hạn, sự hết hạn
thường xuyên, một cách thường xuyên

words.meaning: /im'plai/ v. to suggest that something is true without saying so directly
words.vietnamese: ngụ ý, hàm ý, ẩn ý, ý nói

words.meaning: /promise/ v,n. to tell somebody that you will definitely do or not do something
/protect/ v. to make sure that somebody , something is not harmed, injured
words.vietnamese: bảo vệ, bảo hộ, che chở

words.meaning: /repju:'teiʃn/ n. the overall quality of character
words.vietnamese: tiếng tốt, thanh danh, danh tiếng

words.meaning: /ri'kwaiə/ v. to need something; to depend on s.b / s.th
/və'raiəti/ n. different sorts of the same thing
